flawed_nl_solution:
The 2 8 inch subs total 16 inches because 2 x 8 = <<2*8=16>>16
She still needs 65 inches of sub because 81-16 = <<81-16=65>>65
She needs to buy 31 five inch subs because 65 / 5 = <<65/5=31>>31
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
